/post/hello-world/ ======= First blog post /post/2018-12-10-helloworld/ Wed, 05 Dec 2018 00:00:00 +0000
/post/2018-12-10-helloworld/ >>>>>>> 3b3f1c00b0e64fe6418d978d1c9ef6e4361613bc Hello world! Hello out there. This is Marcelo, a cryptocurrency ambassador, researcher, and modeler. Before that, I was nothing but: an economist which had/wanted to learn a lot about stats and R language, a person who regrets to not have invested in cryptos the first time I’ve heard about it (who doesn’t?), a disciplined guy because of the way of programming, algorithms thinking style, and my need to finish my masters.
